element.name: TfrmMain.OpenForm
element.short: Open a TfrmCustomGrid instance in a new tab or show tab if already open.

element.name: TfrmMain.OpenTab
element.short: Open a form in a new tab or show tab if already open.

descr.p: ClosePinned If True, closes even the pinned tabs. Otherwise, closes only non pinned tabs. The default value is False.

element.name: TfrmMain.UpdateMenu
element.short: Update status of menu items in the context of active tab.

element.name: TfrmMain.UpdateQueryButtons
element.short: Update buttons in the context of the active tab query status.
